articles.description: Latest Nottingham Forest transfer news from NottinghamshireLive as Reds prepare for Premier League
articles.content:
Nottingham Forest want to keep the core of their promotion-winning band of brothers together for their return to the Premier League.
And CEO Dane Murphy says that includes trying to retain the servi… [+4071 chars]
